name: Virtual Realitee Mini Golf
description:
A neat little VR game I made with a group of friends as our first experience making a VR game. We learned a lot from it and there were a few weird parts with Unity being Unity for a few moments but we're still overall proud of the project overall. 

Tested on Oculus Quest 1/2, there might be compatibility issues with other headsets.

A bunch of the dev work can be found on this drive here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1hktCbGGkM4dyAwyXBHKSqxTOU5oF4Xus?usp=sha...
